name: Bible Sons and Daughters Quiz | Bible Families | 10 Questions

questions.text: A daughter's seductive dance led to the beheading of John the Baptist. Who was her mother?
questions.explanation:
Herodias.

	The daughter, Salome, danced before her step-father (King Herod) on his birthday. He offered her anything up to half his kingdom. Herodias urged her to ask for the head of John the Baptist on a platter.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT described as a brother of Jesus?
questions.explanation:
John.

	Mark 6:33, Matthew 13:55-58. Jesus also had a brother named Simon.

questions.text: This son of a woman named Mary (not the mother of Jesus) went with Paul and Barnabas on their first missionary journey. However, he left them in Perga. Who was this man?
questions.explanation:
John Mark.

	Acts 12:25-13:13 Paul and Barnabas later split up their partnership because of a disagreement on whether to give John Mark another chance (Acts 15:36-41). Later it seems Paul forgave John Mark (2 Timothy 4:11).

questions.text: What daughter of David was tragically raped by her brother Amnon?
questions.explanation:
Tamar.

	2 Samuel 13. David's son Absalom later avenged the rape by killing Amnon. This led to many other heartbreaking problems in David's household.

questions.text: According to Proverbs, what will a 'child left to himself' do?
options: bring much suffering to his family

questions.text: According to Paul, what is 'the first commandment with a promise'?
options: Fathers do not provoke your children to wrath
Husbands love your wife as Christ loved the church
Spare the rod and spoil the child
questions.explanation:
Honor your father and mother.

	Deuteronomy 6:15, Ephesians 6:1-3

questions.text: Which was NOT a son of Noah?
Who begged Jesus to heal her demon possessed daughter (Later Jesus said she had 'great faith')?
What Son of Nun said, 'choose for yourselves this day whom you will serve... But as for me and my household we will serve the Lord'?
On what two occasions does God say he is 'well-pleased' with his son, Jesus?
questions.correct: The Baptism and the Transfiguration of Jesus
options: The Baptism and the Crucifixion of Jesus
The Baptism and the Ascension of Jesus
The Baptism and the Resurrection of Jesus
questions.explanation:
The Baptism and the Transfiguration of Jesus.

	Matthew 3:13-17 and Matthew 17:1-13
